channel.title: How do you make monster drops
channel.description: Yup, I honestly don't know how to make drops...I never learned =P Please be as specific as possible, I can be a little slow at things that are new to me. Also, please don't flame if you happen to know how to, I mean come on now...Thanks in advance :)

item.title: How do you make monster drops
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Ooh! thanks! Adding now.

Edit: Added, they still dont drop anything. Also, do i replace all the npcids (where it says that) ?
Edit again: Love your sig Might put it in mine (14)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make monster drops

item.title: How do you make monster drops
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

in item2.java
add

[code]public static int NAME[] = {itemid,itemid};

    public static int randomNAME()
    {
        return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
    }

[/code]

replace name with anynam you want-keep same name for everything though

now in npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

replace name with the same name as before-keep same

then you’re done

Read full topic
